AppArch.HelpText: AppArch is mandatory and must be a string with a value of x86, x64 or *.

AppendInstParaToDefaultParameters.HelpText: AppendInstParaToDefaultParameters is mandatory and must be a boolean.

ProductGUID.HelpText: ProductGUID is mandatory and must be a string.

RemovePackagesWithSameProductGUID.HelpText: RemovePackagesWithSameProductGUID is mandatory and must be a boolean.

PackageGUID.HelpText: PackageGUID is mandatory and must be a string.

UserPartRevision.HelpText: UserPartRevision is mandatory and must be a string.

AppLang.HelpText: AppLang is mandatory and must be a string with a value of a valid culture name.

AppName.HelpText: AppName is mandatory and must be a string. It must not contain any of the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |

AppVendor.HelpText: AppVendor is mandatory and must be a string. It must not contain any of the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |

AppVersion.HelpText: AppVersion is mandatory and must be a string. It must not contain any of the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |

AppKillProcesses.HelpText: AppKillProcesses is mandatory and must be an array.

Name.HelpText: AppKillProcesses.Name is mandatory in each item below AppKillProcesses and must be a string.

Description.HelpText: AppKillProcesses.Description is mandatory for each item below AppKillProcesses and must be a string. If empty, the name will be used.

AcceptedRepairExitCodes.HelpText: AcceptedRepairExitCodes must be a comma separated list of numbers.

TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck is mandatory and must be a PSCustomObject.

Install.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install is mandatory and must be a PSCustomObject.

TotalSecondsToWaitFor.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.TotalSecondsToWaitFor is mandatory and must be an integer.

ProcessesToWaitFor.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.ProcessesToWaitFor is mandatory and must be an array.

Name.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.ProcessesToWaitFor.Name is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.ProcessesToWaitFor and must be a string.

Description.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.ProcessesToWaitFor.Description is mandatory and must be a string. If empty, the name will be used.

RegkeysToWaitFor.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor is mandatory and must be an array.

ValueName.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor.ValueName is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a string.

ValueData.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor.ValueData is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a string.

KeyPath.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor.KeyPath is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a string.

ShouldExist.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor.ShouldExist is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a boolean.

RegKeyOperator.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.RegKeyOperator is mandatory and must be a string with a value of AND or OR.

ProcessOperator.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Install.ProcessOperator is mandatory and must be a string with a value of AND or OR.

Uninstall.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall is mandatory and must be a hashtable.

TotalSecondsToWaitFor.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.TotalSecondsToWaitFor is mandatory and must be an integer.

ProcessesToWaitFor.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.ProcessesToWaitFor is mandatory and must be an array.

Name.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.ProcessesToWaitFor.Name is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.ProcessesToWaitFor and must be a string.

Description.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.ProcessesToWaitFor.Description is mandatory and must be a string. If empty, the name will be used.

RegkeysToWaitFor.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor is mandatory and must be an array.

ValueName.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor.ValueName is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a string.

ValueData.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor.ValueData is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a string.

KeyPath.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor.KeyPath is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a string.

ShouldExist.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor.ShouldExist is mandatory in each item below TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegkeysToWaitFor and must be a boolean.

RegKeyOperator.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.RegKeyOperator is mandatory and must be a string with a value of AND or OR.

ProcessOperator.HelpText: TestConditionsPreSetupSuccessCheck.Uninstall.ProcessOperator is mandatory and must be a string with a value of AND or OR.

App.HelpText: App is mandatory and must be a string.

DirectValues.HelpText: DisplayNamesToExcludeFromAppSearches.DirectValues is optional and must be a string.

DisplayNamesToExcludeFromAppSearches.HelpText: DisplayNamesToExcludeFromAppSearches is mandatory and must be an array.

AppendUninstParaToDefaultParameters.HelpText: AppendUninstParaToDefaultParameters is mandatory and must be a boolean.

AcceptedInstallExitCodes.ErrorMessage: AcceptedInstallExitCodes must be a comma separated list of numbers.

AcceptedUninstallExitCodes.HelpText: AcceptedUninstallExitCodes must be a comma separated list of numbers.
